00039 
00040  PROGRAM main
00041 
00042 ! Common Variables
00043  USE Domain,      ONLY : iStep, MaxStep, now, nxt, RelaxStep, tDump, tStat
00044  USE FluidParams, ONLY : eps, pConv
00045  USE MPIParams,   ONLY : nprocs, proc
00046  USE MPI
00047  IMPLICIT NONE
00048 
00049 ! Local variables
00050  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR
00051 
00052 
00053 ! Initialize MPI environment
00054  CALL MPI_INIT(MPI_ERR)
00055  CALL MPI_COMM_SIZE(MPI_COMM_WORLD, nprocs, MPI_ERR)
00056  CALL MPI_COMM_RANK(MPI_COMM_WORLD, proc, MPI_ERR)
00057 
00058 ! Read input parameters and generate virtual CPU grid
00059  CALL Parameters
00060  CALL VGrid
00061 
00062 ! Allocate memory for common arrays and initialize
00063  CALL MemAlloc(1)
00064  CALL Init
00065 
00066 ! Main iteration loop
00067  DO iStep = 1, MaxStep
00068 
00069 ! Full Step for momentum
00070    CALL CollisionG
00071    CALL PostCollisionG
00072    CALL Update
00073 
00074 ! Fractional Step 1 for order parameter
00075    CALL CollisionF
00076    CALL PostCollisionF
00077    CALL Stream
00078    CALL PostStreamF
00079    CALL Differentials
00080 
00081 ! Fractional Step 2 for order parameter
00082    CALL CollisionF
00083    CALL PostCollisionF
00084    CALL Stream
00085    CALL PostStreamF
00086    CALL Differentials
00087 
00088 ! Update momentum mesh index
00089    now = 1 - now
00090    nxt = 1 - nxt
00091 
00092 ! Save data if required
00093    IF ( MOD(iStep,tStat) == 0 ) CALL Stats
00094    IF ( MOD(iStep,tDump) == 0 ) CALL VtkPlane
00095 
00096 ! Test pressure convergence
00097    IF ( eps <= pConv ) EXIT
00098 
00099  END DO
00100  RelaxStep = iStep - 1
00101 
00102 ! Save final data
00103  CALL VtkPlane
00104  CALL FinalDump
00105 
00106 ! Free memory, close MPI environment and end program
00107  CALL MemAlloc(2)
00108  CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00109 
00110  END PROGRAM
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:56 2008 for ZSC-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
